name: Denave
description: Denave was envisioned over 24 years ago with the goal to become a global sales catalyst. With deep market knowledge, superior data and proprietary technology, our multi-dimensional service offerings help clients across industries such as IT, telecom, ITES, manufacturing, SaaS, electronics & electrical, and more to transform their businesses and find greater sales success.
features: Reach Unreachable Prospects With Accurate B2B Data: Turn cold calls into warm calls by leveraging our complete and contactable B2B data across industries

Consulting: Denave’s retail expertise from core to store lies in providing shopper-centric solutions to augment footfalls, improve customer experience in stores, and equip in-store promoters with the right know-how to expand the bottom line.

Unlock Full-Funnel Growth With Digital Marketing Services: Transform visitors into leads with our audience-led and customer-focused approach. As a leading digital marketing agency, we provide a two-pronged approach i.e. understanding the existing business challenges and activating your brand with customers across all digital touch-points with personalized and targeted experiences.
Headline: Denave has been instrumental in developing solution-driven strategies, delivered through 6 global delivery centers across India, APAC markets and the UK.
ShortDescription: experience in managing the B2B sales enablement and accelerating the success of global enterprises, we proficiently steer our clients through their sales journey

Highlights.name: Reach Unreachable Prospects With Accurate B2B Data Solutions
Highlights.description: We equip enterprise sales teams to focus on high-opportunity buyers with accurate buyer intelligence such as key pain points, direct dials, and B2B email database.

Highlights.name: Creating Retail Experiences That Sells More
Highlights.description: With our integrated visual merchandising and retail audit services, we enable businesses to optimize the health of their store operations and offer seamless shopping experiences. With 100% data-centric retail store audit services, we build visibility into planogram, store merchandising, promoter readiness and ensure complete compliance.

Highlights.name: Turn Insights Into Actions
Highlights.description: To keep pace with changing business dynamics, organizations should mine enterprise data to gain competitive advantage and make confident business decisions. Denave’s business analytics solution connects the dots between data, insights, and sales processes to eliminate business process silos

Highlights.name: AI-Powered Digital Marketing Agency
Highlights.description: Transform your digital customer outreach and scale pipeline faster with AI-led, data-driven digital marketing services. With a tailored strategy, full-funnel ROI tracking, and AI-enabled marketing tech, we help businesses drive key revenue metrics- from brand traffic to sales revenue.

enhanced_description: Denave, established in 1999, is a global sales catalyst with over 24 years of experience in B2B sales enablement, accelerating the success of global enterprises. Leveraging deep market knowledge, superior data, and proprietary technology, Denave provides multi-dimensional service offerings to clients across industries such as IT, telecom, ITES, manufacturing, SaaS, electronics & electrical, and more. These solution-driven strategies are delivered through 6 global delivery centers located across India, APAC markets, and the UK, helping businesses transform and achieve greater sales success.
key_use_cases: Brand activation and digital customer outreach
Business analytics for data-driven decision making
competitive_advantages: Superior B2B data solutions (accurate buyer intelligence, direct dials, B2B email database)
roi_benefits: Conversion of cold calls into warm calls
Driving key revenue metrics (brand traffic to sales revenue)
